Package homeautomation.actors

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    IActor
    Parent interface for all actors.
    IMotor
    Parent interface for all (DC) motors.
    IServo
    Parent interface for all Servos.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ElecticalOutletSwitch
    Representation of an electronical outlet switch controlled by an rf link transmitter.
    RaspPiLed  
    RfLinkTransmitter
    Representation of a switch for electrical outlet.
    TinkerforgeDcBrickMotor
    A DC motor attached to a Tinkerforge DC brick can run with a velocity between -100% and -100%.
    TinkerforgeLcd
    Wrapper class for the LCD bricklet.
    TinkerforgeServo
    Representation of a servo attached to a Tinkerforge servo brick.
    TinkerforgeServoBrick
    Representation of a Tinkerforge servo brick.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    IActor.ActorType
    The interface knows the type of the actors, bad style.
    IActor.Commands
    POssible actor commands.
    RaspPiLed.Mode
    The dummy mode is used for debugging where the physical sensor is not available.
    RfLinkTransmitter.Mode
    The dummy mode is used for debugging where the physical sensor is not available.
